examples: We’re having a bit of a blow this afternoon.

definitions.definition: ( informal ) A chance to catch one's breath .
examples: The players were able to get a blow during the last timeout.

definitions.definition: ( uncountable , US Chicago dialectal , slang ) Heroin .

examples: His girlfriend gave him a blow .

definitions.definition: ( nautical ) An instance of using high - pressure air to empty water from the ballast tanks of a submarine , increasing the submarine's buoyancy and causing it to surface .

secondary_definitions: ( informal ) A chance to catch one's breath .
( uncountable , US Chicago dialectal , slang ) Heroin .
( nautical ) An instance of using high - pressure air to empty water from the ballast tanks of a submarine , increasing the submarine's buoyancy and causing it to surface .

definitions.definition: An instance of the act of striking or hitting .
examples: A fabricator is used to direct a sharp blow to the surface of the stone.
During an exchange to end round 13, Duran landed a blow to the midsection.

definitions.definition: A sudden or forcible act or effort; an assault.

examples: A further blow to the group came in 1917 when Thomson died while canoeing in Algonquin Park.

definitions.definition: ( Australia , shearing , historical ) A cut made to a sheep's fleece by a shearer using hand-shears .
( Australia , New Zealand ) An outcrop of quartz from surrounding rock, thought to indicate mineral deposits below.
( television ) Synonym of button ( “ the punchy or suspenseful line of dialogue that concludes a scene ” ) .

main_definition: An instance of the act of striking or hitting .
secondary_definitions: A sudden or forcible act or effort; an assault.
( Australia , shearing , historical ) A cut made to a sheep's fleece by a shearer using hand-shears .
( Australia , New Zealand ) An outcrop of quartz from surrounding rock, thought to indicate mineral deposits below.
( television ) Synonym of button ( “ the punchy or suspenseful line of dialogue that concludes a scene ” ) .

definitions.definition: A state of flowering ; a bloom .
A display or mass of flowers ; a yield .
A display of anything bright or brilliant .

main_definition: A state of flowering ; a bloom .
secondary_definitions: A display or mass of flowers ; a yield .
( figurative ) A display of anything bright or brilliant .
